channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Business Automation Workflow
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Business Automation Workflow

item.title: CVE-2018-1999|2024-08-05T04:14:39.542Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow 18.0.0.0, 18.0.0.1, and 18.0.0.2 could reveal sensitive version information about the server from error pages that could aid an attacker in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 154889.

item.title: CVE-2018-1848|2024-08-05T04:14:38.561Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow 18.0.0.0 and 18.0.0.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 150947.

item.title: CVE-2018-2000|2024-08-05T04:14:39.558Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow 18.0.0.0 and 18.0.0.1 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 154890.

item.title: CVE-2018-1997|2024-08-05T04:14:39.653Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow and Business Process Manager 18.0.0.0, 18.0.0.1, and 18.0.0.2 are vulnerable to a denial of service attack. An authenticated attacker might send a specially crafted request that exhausts server-side memory. IBM X-Force ID: 154774.

item.title: CVE-2018-1885|2024-08-05T04:14:38.618Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow 18.0.0.0, 18.0.0.1, and 18.0.0.2 could allow an unauthenticated attacker to obtain sensitve information using a specially cracted HTTP request. IBM X-Force ID: 152020.

item.title: CVE-2024-38321|2024-08-03T13:34:16.845Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow 22.0.2, 23.0.1, 23.0.2, and 24.0.0 stores potentially sensitive information in log files under certain situations that could be read by an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 284868.

item.title: CVE-2024-38321|2024-08-03T18:49:24.893Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow 22.0.2, 23.0.1, 23.0.2, and 24.0.0 stores potentially sensitive information in log files under certain situations that could be read by an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 284868.
